sentences.sContent: In a word, you are erudite and always open your eyes to new things.

sentences.sContent: As Pankaj Mishra, a prolific Indian writer, shows in this subtle, erudite and entertaining account of Asian intellectuals' responses to the West, much the same was true over a century ago.

sentences.sCn: 印度高产作家潘卡旭以精细、博学和有趣的文笔描绘出亚洲知识分子对西方的反应，他们的反应与一个多世纪前的人们的反应差不多。
